products.name: Xerox
products.desc: Elevate your office's productivity and creativity with the Xerox C75 Color Multifunction Printer. Designed for businesses that demand versatility, speed, and exceptional quality, the C75 delivers outstanding color printing, copying, scanning, and finishing capabilities—all in one compact device. Whether you're producing vibrant marketing materials or essential business documents, the C75 empowers you to achieve professional results with ease.

features.content: Delivers vibrant prints with a resolution of up to 2400 x 2400 dpi, ensuring professional-grade output for all your documents.
Achieves impressive print speeds of up to 75 pages per minute, enhancing productivity in busy office environments.
Supports a wide variety of media sizes and types, allowing for creative projects ranging from brochures to envelopes.
Features single-pass duplex scanning, enabling fast and efficient scanning of double-sided documents.
Offers multiple finishing capabilities, including stapling, hole punching, and booklet making, for polished, professional presentations.
The intuitive touchscreen display simplifies operation, making it easy for all users to navigate and access features quickly.
Includes advanced security options like user authentication and secure print, protecting sensitive information and ensuring compliance.

products.name: Xerox
products.desc: Introducing the DocuColor 700/700i/770, the ultimate solution for vibrant, high-quality color printing that meets the demands of modern businesses. Intuitive touch-screen interface with customizable workflows for streamlined operation and ease of use.
Comprehensive finishing options, including inline booklet-making, trimming, and folding for professional presentations.
Robust job management features with advanced job queuing and tracking for optimal print workflow.
Energy-efficient design that meets environmental standards while delivering high performance.
